text: Juan Martínez Martin (born November 25, 1980 in Granada) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability and is T46 type athlete. He raced at the 2000 Summer Paralympics in Sydney, Australia. He finished second in the 4 X 400 meter T42-T46 relay. == References == Category:Spanish middle-distance runners Category:Living people Category:1980 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Granada Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T46
title: Juan Martínez Martin
